ann:
&c&l V0.0.5 is available!
&e&l*&4&l For your account security, Chimera no longer provides "Mark Dungeon Star Mob" since version v0.0.5+(more see detail 1)
&e&l* Program optimization,reduce the performance of program execution consumption(more see detail 2)
&c&l Chimera new information
&e&l* &b<Chimera 2> Comming Soon,This version is make for cheaters, But it maybe not free ,Because &4&l Don't forget that money can be earn, but you can earn more if u  without conscience.&b(more see detail 3)
detail:
&b 1. Because "Mark Dungeon Star Mob" may let you get ban, So For your account security,&4&lSince version v0.0.5+ Chimera no longer provides "Mark Dungeon Star Mob"
&b 2. Because the program is optimized, it may cause some bugs, if you find any bugs, please report
&b 3. <Chimera 2> Comming Soon, But it maybe not free ,Because &4&l Don't forget that money can be earn, but you can earn more if u  without conscience.
